overview: Xiaofan, a young girl who works at a Karaoke Club, awakes one morning in a remote forest with her body covered in blood. As she struggles to find her way out, she tries to understand the drama circumstances which got her into the situation, events mainly related to her unpredictable boyfriend. She needs to make a decision that may change her life.
tagline: In a world of hypocrisy, you need to know someone really well, to realize you are strangers
title: Ni Jing: Thou Shalt Not Steal
